name: server
description: This is a simple project that create blogs and allows you to manipulate them.

scripts.make-migration: npx sequelize-cli model:generate --name Blog --attributes title:string,slug:string,content:string,image:string,published_at:date,deleted_at:date --models-path app/models --migrations-path app/migrations
scripts.migrate-dev: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --config app/config/index.js --migrations-path app/migrations --env development
scripts.migrate-prod: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --config app/config/index.js --migrations-path app/migrations --env production
scripts.migrate-undo-dev: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo --config app/config/index.js --migrations-path app/migrations --env development
scripts.migrate-undo-prod: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo --config app/config/index.js --migrations-path app/migrations --env production
scripts.seed-dev: npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --config app/config/index.js --seeders-path app/seeders --env development
scripts.seed-prod: npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --config app/config/index.js --seeders-path app/seeders --env production
scripts.seed:undo-dev: npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo --config app/config/index.js --seeders-path app/seeders --env development
scripts.seed:undo-prod: npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo --config app/config/index.js --seeders-path app/seeders --env production
scripts.db-init-dev: npm run pre-migration && npm run migrate-dev && npm run seed-dev
scripts.db-init-prod: npm run pre-migration && npm run migrate-prod && npm run seed-prod
scripts.db-undo-dev: npm run seed:undo-dev && npm run migrate-undo-dev
scripts.db-undo-prod: npm run seed:undo-prod && npm run migrate-undo-prod

author: Posi Adeyemi
